name: My Dream World
description:
Each one of us would be having a world that they dream to be of. A world of their choice, their likes and passions and all the goodness that they like and desire included in this world.
Though the truth is that we cannot live in such a world, a dream world does exist in each one us.
I too have a dream world of my own. I dream big, far and wide of the world that I live in. I dream of a world where there is no hatred and violence. I am sad and afraid to live in such a world that is full of sins and negativity. I have a dream world where there is no violence, no hatred, no greed, but just peace, love and harmony. A world where there is lots of fun and goodness and where it is safe for every human being who lives in there.
Though this is a dream, I sincerely wish that our world would one day become a place filled with love and harmony rather than what today man does, with all his hatred. We need to guide the coming generation and we have the equal responsibility of showing them the right path in life. Though this is my dream world, I would strive the way that I could to get my dream to reality, so that the world would be a much better place and when my dream comes true, it would be worth having a dream.
